Articles.Content:
Hello!

As the others, I would like to thank KSP team and the community for the game and all the mods!

Thank you all!

Thanks KSP team, it was good while it lasted.

 

Bye all.
Thanks Squad for an amazing game, and huge thanks to amazing community for all the mods and other great stuff

I would just like to add my thanks to all the people who visit the forums and may , in some way, keep the inspiration and the game alive.  In this point and click world it is very easy to think that things can be done with a few clicks of the button , and I have to say there are some out there with very little patience ( as we can be when we can't live without something) , but as time and updates have progressed through the years, there has always been a light as ferocious as the sun at the end of the tunnel , and for me that light is  THE MODDING COMMUNITY , I know nothing about modding which is why I rely on them soooooo much to make a good game  fantastic.

So I guess this is my way to thank all you Modders out there , and the people who contribute to this wonderful ever evolving game. And please have some respect , we are people , not machines.
I LOVE YOU GUYS FOR MAKING SUCH AN AMAZING GAME!!!
If KSP was a dog, and I owned it, it would be very happy.

- 6 year old thread

- Still going strong.

Kind of TRULY "open-world" game... great support... amazing forum/community... open info/support for mod-makers... UNBELIEVABLE professional mod-makers which add pretty much everything else to the game...

Yeah, LONG LIVE! 

Edited December 11, 2018 by Cataclism

I suppose that I’ll add the next car to the respect train:

Ksp is the only game that I never cease to bore of. Perhaps I play more flashy titles then and now, but I have never gone a long time without returning to our beloved world of little green folk. 

On 5/4/2018 at 10:15 AM, releansol said:

1005 hours. still in love - thanks Squad! I enjoy this﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ gam﻿e like a "fillet rossini" 

Except I have seldom known a “fillet Rossini” that can be perpetually enjoyed.

One to rule them all: KSP
 best simulation of all time, more space to explore than anyone can imagine, simply the best!

Happy 1.6, with more vee than ever! Cheers!!! And thank you SQUAD!
I'm sure that our thanks will never be enough but thank you Felipe and Squad for making realistic space exploration fun
